title: Luciafolx
author: Luciafolx
content: Hello! im new here, i was scammed 1 time for 35k$ on btc but I was able to recover it. Anyone faced that bad situation?

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: Quote from: Luciafolx on July 17, 2023, 12:28:55 AMHello! im new here, i was scammed 1 time for 35k$ on btc but I was able to recover it. Anyone faced that bad situation?you are one of the luckiest man in crypto world , winning back a 35k scammed amount?maybe instead of asking about the same thing on you? why not tell your story on how that happened.

comments.author: Aim High
comments.body: Quote from: Luciafolx on July 17, 2023, 12:28:55 AMHello! im new here, i was scammed 1 time for 35k$ on btc but I was able to recover it. Anyone faced that bad situation? how did that happen, lucky ending, please share the story!I have been scammed countless times before, it's a daily event in crypto for most people

comments.author: Luciafolx
comments.body: They tricked me in a scam that I saw on YouTube to double your bitcoins, and silly me, I sent $35k in BTC, as expected I received nothing, I went very crazy I was about to commit suicide, but my ex boyfriend had a contact who he is a kind of "hacker" and he was able to follow the transaction to the final wallet, and luckily that wallet had carried out several scams and was able to contact other victims and among all of them he was able to collect information, he obtained the name of the person and went to denounce her with all her data, and after weeks I received my money. That's really what he told me he did, although I don't care much about the only thing I know that he got my money back. Now I think he is dedicated to something like that, I have his contact, but I will never contact him again because I have already learned my lesson. And this is my horrible story.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Well I did never hear about such a way to recover your coins. This is a horrible story for you, but at least there was a happy ending for you. It is good thing your ex boyfriend was a hacker like that. I am still wondering what made this bad person give you the coins back.

That's really what he told me he did, although I don't care much about the only thing I know that he got my money back. Now I think he is dedicated to something like that, I have his contact, but I will never contact him again because I have already learned my lesson. And this is my horrible story.oh wow, that was a lucky ending indeed, don't remember a single time where i got my money back

Did you buy more bitcoins?I have managed to invest them safely thanks to a friend who is a financial engineer, I will never trust false gurus again.

Anyone faced that bad situation?You are new here but you are lucky enough to recover what have scammed from you? wow you are one of a Hell man because there is only once in a million cases that scamming in bitcoin have recovered because it is transaction here is irreversible so can you tell us how this happens?Quote from: Luciafolx on July 17, 2023, 09:00:13 PMThey tricked me in a scam that I saw on YouTube to double your bitcoins, and silly me, I sent $35k in BTC, as expected I received nothing, I went very crazy I was about to commit suicide, but my ex boyfriend had a contact who he is a kind of "hacker" and he was able to follow the transaction to the final wallet, and luckily that wallet had carried out several scams and was able to contact other victims and among all of them he was able to collect information, he obtained the name of the person and went to denounce her with all her data, and after weeks I received my money. And this is my horrible story.this is something that only few have a chance mate, congratulations for this super lucky situation of yours and yeah 35k? that is something stupidbeing sent just to a internet guy.

comments.author: Frist id
comments.body: It is my first id.So i'm new member the forum.

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Quote from: Frist id on December 06, 2023, 04:47:10 PMIt is my first id.So i'm new member the forum. Literally "First ID" lol   --------------------------------------------OP , Congratulations for winning back that 35 thousand dollars , I cannot imagine that amount is still recoverable considering How good these scammers are so I may say you are the luckiest human in crypto for me that's by the story you told us and kuddos to the people who helped you take it back , you guys are amazing .

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Well, for OP if you really were scammed and was able to recover it then that's so good for you. But let me just look at what happened to you.It's like telling that you've been scammed, your ex-BF came to rescue you and traced the hacker with the name and all of her stuff/data.And then asked to send you back the money. Hmmm, sounds a legit story and thieves won't do such acts like that IMO.

comments.author: jojoalex
comments.body: hello im new too, good thing u were able to recover them

In my opinion just stay with him he literally helped you get back $35k through what was a genuinely hopeless situation to most people

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: Luciafolx on July 17, 2023, 12:28:55 AMHello! im new here, i was scammed 1 time for 35k$ on btc but I was able to recover it. Anyone faced that bad situation?this is the reason why Up to now for how many years here in crypto? never that I invest  or even engage in people that I never come to meet, yeah sometimes I did a deal in transacting if needed to buy or send funds but only dealing with old timer means those account that has Positive trust most of the time or if not?I uses Escrow to make sure that the transaction will go through .Quote from: filmebi on December 10, 2023, 06:15:09 PMIt's a bad situation.  Quote from: filmebi on December 10, 2023, 06:15:09 PMIt's a bad situation.  still a best lesson to learn the hard way.

comments.author: kotajikikox
comments.body: Quote from: jojoalex on December 08, 2023, 11:07:25 PMhello im new too, good thing u were able to recover themWelcome and you are also lucky to find this thread because now you know something how not to be scammed as OP's experiences being shared so learn from it and never to be fooled of anything from Internet.Quote from: filmebi on December 10, 2023, 06:15:09 PMIt's a bad situation.  indeed its bad , but good that he manage to find it back that is the best thing about it.
